New Records: Bam Adebayo had his first good game of 2025, finishing with 19 points, nine rebounds, and five assists on 64.3 percent shooting and made his only attempt from three-point range.
Key Match Events: Nikola Jovic continued his breakout season with another dominant performance, finishing with 20 points, six rebounds, and four assists on 47.1 percent shooting and 25 percent from three-point range.
Pre-Game Insights: The Heat remain undefeated when Alec Burks is utilized as a major part of the rotation, finishing with 11 points, four rebounds, and zero assists on 50 percent shooting and 50 percent from three-point range.
Post-Match Reflections: The Miami Heat (18-17) earned a much-needed victory against the Golden State Warriors (18-18) to move up in the Eastern Conference.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaime Jaquez Jr. has had back-to-back good games in the starting lineup, finishing with 18 points, five rebounds, and one assist on 58.3 percent shooting and 33.3 percent from three-point range.
